query.en: What is the punishment for theft?

response.description: Theft is punishable with imprisonment up to 3 years, or fine, or both.
response.cultural_reference: Don't steal bikes. This isn't a movie!
response.substantive_guidance: File an FIR and consult a lawyer.

ta.description: திருட்டுக்கு 3 ஆண்டுகள் வரை சிறை அல்லது அபராதம் விதிக்கலாம்.

te.description: దొంగతనానికి గరిష్ఠంగా 3 సంవత్సరాల జైలు లేదా జరిమానా విధించవచ్చు.
